name: coe_number_of_days
title: How many days after Acceptance will closing occur?
label: Closing Days
description: Usually it takes at least 30 days.
tips: Consider loan processing time, inspections, and other contingencies when setting the closing timeline.
small_print: It is important to think through this and talk to the various vendors you will be working with to inspect the property, as well as your lender, in order to meet the timeline that is proposed.

coe_number_of_days.name: coe_number_of_days

suggested.hint: The input value falls outside of standard values.

coe_number_of_days.tooltip: Enter the number of days until closing
